name: Jan-Ken Pow! 64
description:
Engage in a frantic battle of rock paper scissors against your friends. Game made for the #lowrezjam2017.

! Play first and charge a stronger attack OR let the other player play first to know their weakness ! Controls (tutorial advised) RockPaperScissorsAttackCharge attackPlayer 1SDFEhold EPlayer 2leftdownrightuphold up Credits

Art and Design by Draxen (@Draxen1)

Music by Alex (@alex_campan)

Code by Tselmek (@tselmek)
